ds2.1.2:1.2.pli: Yasmiṃ samaye rūpūpapattiyā maggaṃ bhāveti vivicceva kāmehi vivicca akusalehi dhammehi savitakkaṃ savicāraṃ vivekajaṃ pītisukhaṃ paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati pathavīkasiṇaṃ, tasmiṃ samaye phasso hoti …pe… avikkhepo hoti …pe…

ds2.1.2:2.2.pli: Yasmiṃ samaye rūpūpapattiyā maggaṃ bhāveti vitakkavicārānaṃ vūpasamā ajjhattaṃ sampasādanaṃ cetaso ekodibhāvaṃ avitakkaṃ avicāraṃ samādhijaṃ pītisukhaṃ dutiyaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati pathavīkasiṇaṃ, tasmiṃ samaye phasso hoti, vedanā hoti, saññā hoti, cetanā hoti, cittaṃ hoti, pīti hoti, sukhaṃ hoti, cittassekaggatā hoti, saddhindriyaṃ hoti, vīriyindriyaṃ hoti, satindriyaṃ hoti, samādhindriyaṃ hoti, paññindriyaṃ hoti, manindriyaṃ hoti, somanassindriyaṃ hoti, jīvitindriyaṃ hoti, sammādiṭṭhi hoti, sammāvāyāmo hoti …pe… paggāho hoti, avikkhepo hoti;

ds2.1.2:2.3.pli: ye vā pana tasmiṃ samaye aññepi atthi paṭiccasamuppannā arūpino dhammā—

ds2.1.2:3.1.pli: Tasmiṃ kho pana samaye cattāro khandhā honti, dvāyatanāni honti, dve dhātuyo honti, tayo āhārā honti, aṭṭhindriyāni honti, tivaṅgikaṃ jhānaṃ hoti, caturaṅgiko maggo hoti, satta balāni honti, tayo hetū honti, eko phasso hoti …pe… ekaṃ dhammāyatanaṃ hoti, ekā dhammadhātu hoti;

ds2.1.2:3.2.pli: ye vā pana tasmiṃ samaye aññepi atthi paṭiccasamuppannā arūpino dhammā—

ds2.1.2:4.2.pli: Phasso cetanā pīti cittassekaggatā saddhindriyaṃ vīriyindriyaṃ satindriyaṃ samādhindriyaṃ paññindriyaṃ jīvitindriyaṃ sammādiṭṭhi sammāvāyāmo …pe… paggāho avikkhepo;

ds2.1.2:4.3.pli: ye vā pana tasmiṃ samaye aññepi atthi paṭiccasamuppannā arūpino dhammā ṭhapetvā vedanākkhandhaṃ ṭhapetvā saññākkhandhaṃ ṭhapetvā viññāṇakkhandhaṃ—

ds2.1.2:5.2.pli: Yasmiṃ samaye rūpūpapattiyā maggaṃ bhāveti pītiyā ca virāgā upekkhako ca viharati sato ca sampajāno sukhañca kāyena paṭisaṃvedeti, yaṃ taṃ ariyā ācikkhanti—“upekkhako satimā sukhavihārī”ti tatiyaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati pathavīkasiṇaṃ, tasmiṃ samaye phasso hoti, vedanā hoti, saññā hoti, cetanā hoti, cittaṃ hoti, sukhaṃ hoti, cittassekaggatā hoti, saddhindriyaṃ hoti, vīriyindriyaṃ hoti, satindriyaṃ hoti, samādhindriyaṃ hoti, paññindriyaṃ hoti, manindriyaṃ hoti, somanassindriyaṃ hoti, jīvitindriyaṃ hoti, sammādiṭṭhi hoti, sammāvāyāmo hoti …pe… paggāho hoti, avikkhepo hoti;

ds2.1.2:5.3.pli: ye vā pana tasmiṃ samaye aññepi atthi paṭiccasamuppannā arūpino dhammā—

ds2.1.2:6.1.pli: Tasmiṃ kho pana samaye cattāro khandhā honti, dvāyatanāni honti, dve dhātuyo honti, tayo āhārā honti, aṭṭhindriyāni honti, duvaṅgikaṃ jhānaṃ hoti, caturaṅgiko maggo hoti, satta balāni honti, tayo hetū honti, eko phasso hoti …pe… ekaṃ dhammāyatanaṃ hoti, ekā dhammadhātu hoti;

ds2.1.2:6.2.pli: ye vā pana tasmiṃ samaye aññepi atthi paṭiccasamuppannā arūpino dhammā—

ds2.1.2:7.2.pli: Phasso cetanā cittassekaggatā saddhindriyaṃ vīriyindriyaṃ satindriyaṃ samādhindriyaṃ paññindriyaṃ jīvitindriyaṃ sammādiṭṭhi sammāvāyāmo …pe… paggāho avikkhepo;

ds2.1.2:7.3.pli: ye vā pana tasmiṃ samaye aññepi atthi paṭiccasamuppannā arūpino dhammā ṭhapetvā vedanākkhandhaṃ ṭhapetvā saññākkhandhaṃ ṭhapetvā viññāṇakkhandhaṃ—

ds2.1.2:8.2.pli: Yasmiṃ samaye rūpūpapattiyā maggaṃ bhāveti sukhassa ca pahānā dukkhassa ca pahānā pubbeva somanassadomanassānaṃ atthaṅgamā adukkhamasukhaṃ upekkhāsatipārisuddhiṃ catutthaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati pathavīkasiṇaṃ, tasmiṃ samaye phasso hoti, vedanā hoti, saññā hoti, cetanā hoti, cittaṃ hoti, upekkhā hoti, cittassekaggatā hoti, saddhindriyaṃ hoti, vīriyindriyaṃ hoti, satindriyaṃ hoti, samādhindriyaṃ hoti, paññindriyaṃ hoti, manindriyaṃ hoti upekkhindriyaṃ hoti, jīvitindriyaṃ hoti, sammādiṭṭhi hoti, sammāvāyāmo hoti …pe… paggāho hoti, avikkhepo hoti;

ds2.1.2:8.3.pli: ye vā pana tasmiṃ samaye aññepi atthi paṭiccasamuppannā arūpino dhammā—

ds2.1.2:9.1.pli: Tasmiṃ kho pana samaye cattāro khandhā honti, dvāyatanāni honti, dve dhātuyo honti, tayo āhārā honti, aṭṭhindriyāni honti, duvaṅgikaṃ jhānaṃ hoti, caturaṅgiko maggo hoti, satta balāni honti, tayo hetū honti, eko phasso hoti …pe… ekaṃ dhammāyatanaṃ hoti, ekā dhammadhātu hoti;

ds2.1.2:9.2.pli: ye vā pana tasmiṃ samaye aññepi atthi paṭiccasamuppannā arūpino dhammā—

ds2.1.2:10.2.pli: Phasso cetanā cittassekaggatā saddhindriyaṃ vīriyindriyaṃ satindriyaṃ samādhindriyaṃ paññindriyaṃ jīvitindriyaṃ sammādiṭṭhi sammāvāyāmo …pe… paggāho avikkhepo;

ds2.1.2:10.3.pli: ye vā pana tasmiṃ samaye aññepi atthi paṭiccasamuppannā arūpino dhammā ṭhapetvā vedanākkhandhaṃ ṭhapetvā saññākkhandhaṃ ṭhapetvā viññāṇakkhandhaṃ—

ds2.1.2:11.2.pli: Yasmiṃ samaye rūpūpapattiyā maggaṃ bhāveti vivicceva kāmehi …pe… paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati pathavīkasiṇaṃ—

ds2.1.2:11.3.pli: tasmiṃ samaye phasso hoti …pe… avikkhepo hoti …pe…

ds2.1.2:12.2.pli: Yasmiṃ samaye rūpūpapattiyā maggaṃ bhāveti avitakkaṃ vicāramattaṃ samādhijaṃ pītisukhaṃ dutiyaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati pathavīkasiṇaṃ, tasmiṃ samaye phasso hoti, vedanā hoti, saññā hoti, cetanā hoti, cittaṃ hoti, vicāro hoti, pīti hoti, sukhaṃ hoti, cittassekaggatā hoti, saddhindriyaṃ hoti, vīriyindriyaṃ hoti, satindriyaṃ hoti, samādhindriyaṃ hoti, paññindriyaṃ hoti, manindriyaṃ hoti, somanassindriyaṃ hoti, jīvitindriyaṃ hoti, sammādiṭṭhi hoti, sammāvāyāmo hoti …pe… paggāho hoti, avikkhepo hoti;

ds2.1.2:12.3.pli: ye vā pana tasmiṃ samaye aññepi atthi paṭiccasamuppannā arūpino dhammā—

ds2.1.2:13.1.pli: Tasmiṃ kho pana samaye cattāro khandhā honti, dvāyatanāni honti, dve dhātuyo honti, tayo āhārā honti, aṭṭhindriyāni honti, caturaṅgikaṃ jhānaṃ hoti, caturaṅgiko maggo hoti, satta balāni honti, tayo hetū honti, eko phasso hoti …pe… ekaṃ dhammāyatanaṃ hoti, ekā dhammadhātu hoti;

ds2.1.2:13.2.pli: ye vā pana tasmiṃ samaye aññepi atthi paṭiccasamuppannā arūpino dhammā—

ds2.1.2:14.2.pli: Phasso cetanā vicāro pīti cittassekaggatā saddhindriyaṃ vīriyindriyaṃ satindriyaṃ samādhindriyaṃ paññindriyaṃ jīvitindriyaṃ sammādiṭṭhi sammāvāyāmo …pe… paggāho avikkhepo;

ds2.1.2:14.3.pli: ye vā pana tasmiṃ samaye aññepi atthi paṭiccasamuppannā arūpino dhammā ṭhapetvā vedanākkhandhaṃ ṭhapetvā saññākkhandhaṃ ṭhapetvā viññāṇakkhandhaṃ—

ds2.1.2:15.2.pli: Yasmiṃ samaye rūpūpapattiyā maggaṃ bhāveti vitakkavicārānaṃ vūpasamā …pe… tatiyaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati pathavīkasiṇaṃ, tasmiṃ samaye phasso hoti, vedanā hoti, saññā hoti, cetanā hoti, cittaṃ hoti, pīti hoti, sukhaṃ hoti, cittassekaggatā hoti, saddhindriyaṃ hoti, vīriyindriyaṃ hoti, satindriyaṃ hoti, samādhindriyaṃ hoti, paññindriyaṃ hoti, manindriyaṃ hoti, somanassindriyaṃ hoti, jīvitindriyaṃ hoti, sammādiṭṭhi hoti, sammāvāyāmo hoti …pe… paggāho hoti, avikkhepo hoti;

ds2.1.2:15.3.pli: ye vā pana tasmiṃ samaye aññepi atthi paṭiccasamuppannā arūpino dhammā—

ds2.1.2:16.1.pli: Tasmiṃ kho pana samaye cattāro khandhā honti, dvāyatanāni honti, dve dhātuyo honti, tayo āhārā honti, aṭṭhindriyāni honti, tivaṅgikaṃ jhānaṃ hoti, caturaṅgiko maggo hoti, satta balāni honti, tayo hetū honti, eko phasso hoti …pe… ekaṃ dhammāyatanaṃ hoti, ekā dhammadhātu hoti;

ds2.1.2:16.2.pli: ye vā pana tasmiṃ samaye aññepi atthi paṭiccasamuppannā arūpino dhammā—

ds2.1.2:17.2.pli: Phasso cetanā pīti cittassekaggatā saddhindriyaṃ vīriyindriyaṃ satindriyaṃ samādhindriyaṃ paññindriyaṃ jīvitindriyaṃ sammādiṭṭhi sammāvāyāmo …pe… paggāho avikkhepo;

ds2.1.2:17.3.pli: ye vā pana tasmiṃ samaye aññepi atthi paṭiccasamuppannā arūpino dhammā ṭhapetvā vedanākkhandhaṃ ṭhapetvā saññākkhandhaṃ ṭhapetvā viññāṇakkhandhaṃ—

ds2.1.2:18.2.pli: Yasmiṃ samaye rūpūpapattiyā maggaṃ bhāveti pītiyā ca virāgā …pe… catutthaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati pathavīkasiṇaṃ, tasmiṃ samaye phasso hoti, vedanā hoti, saññā hoti, cetanā hoti, cittaṃ hoti, sukhaṃ hoti, cittassekaggatā hoti, saddhindriyaṃ hoti, vīriyindriyaṃ hoti, satindriyaṃ hoti, samādhindriyaṃ hoti, paññindriyaṃ hoti, manindriyaṃ hoti, somanassindriyaṃ hoti, jīvitindriyaṃ hoti, sammādiṭṭhi hoti, sammāvāyāmo hoti …pe… paggāho hoti, avikkhepo hoti;

ds2.1.2:18.3.pli: ye vā pana tasmiṃ samaye aññepi atthi paṭiccasamuppannā arūpino dhammā—

ds2.1.2:19.1.pli: Tasmiṃ kho pana samaye cattāro khandhā honti, dvāyatanāni honti, dve dhātuyo honti, tayo āhārā honti, aṭṭhindriyāni honti, duvaṅgikaṃ jhānaṃ hoti, caturaṅgiko maggo hoti, satta balāni honti, tayo hetū honti, eko phasso hoti …pe… ekaṃ dhammāyatanaṃ hoti, ekā dhammadhātu hoti;

ds2.1.2:19.2.pli: ye vā pana tasmiṃ samaye aññepi atthi paṭiccasamuppannā arūpino dhammā—

ds2.1.2:20.2.pli: Phasso cetanā cittassekaggatā saddhindriyaṃ vīriyindriyaṃ satindriyaṃ samādhindriyaṃ paññindriyaṃ jīvitindriyaṃ sammādiṭṭhi sammāvāyāmo …pe… paggāho avikkhepo;

ds2.1.2:20.3.pli: ye vā pana tasmiṃ samaye aññepi atthi paṭiccasamuppannā arūpino dhammā ṭhapetvā vedanākkhandhaṃ ṭhapetvā saññākkhandhaṃ ṭhapetvā viññāṇakkhandhaṃ—

ds2.1.2:21.2.pli: Yasmiṃ samaye rūpūpapattiyā maggaṃ bhāveti sukhassa ca pahānā …pe…

ds2.1.2:21.3.pli: pañcamaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati pathavīkasiṇaṃ, tasmiṃ samaye phasso hoti, vedanā hoti, saññā hoti, cetanā hoti, cittaṃ hoti, upekkhā hoti, cittassekaggatā hoti, saddhindriyaṃ hoti, vīriyindriyaṃ hoti, satindriyaṃ hoti, samādhindriyaṃ hoti, paññindriyaṃ hoti, manindriyaṃ hoti, upekkhindriyaṃ hoti, jīvitindriyaṃ hoti, sammādiṭṭhi hoti, sammāvāyāmo hoti …pe… paggāho hoti, avikkhepo hoti;

ds2.1.2:21.4.pli: ye vā pana tasmiṃ samaye aññepi atthi paṭiccasamuppannā arūpino dhammā—

ds2.1.2:22.1.pli: Tasmiṃ kho pana samaye cattāro khandhā honti, dvāyatanāni honti, dve dhātuyo honti, tayo āhārā honti, aṭṭhindriyāni honti, duvaṅgikaṃ jhānaṃ hoti, caturaṅgiko maggo hoti, satta balāni honti, tayo hetū honti, eko phasso hoti …pe… ekaṃ dhammāyatanaṃ hoti, ekā dhammadhātu hoti;

ds2.1.2:22.2.pli: ye vā pana tasmiṃ samaye aññepi atthi paṭiccasamuppannā arūpino dhammā—

ds2.1.2:23.2.pli: Phasso cetanā cittassekaggatā saddhindriyaṃ vīriyindriyaṃ satindriyaṃ samādhindriyaṃ paññindriyaṃ jīvitindriyaṃ sammādiṭṭhi sammāvāyāmo …pe… paggāho avikkhepo;

ds2.1.2:23.3.pli: ye vā pana tasmiṃ samaye aññepi atthi paṭiccasamuppannā arūpino dhammā ṭhapetvā vedanākkhandhaṃ ṭhapetvā saññākkhandhaṃ ṭhapetvā viññāṇakkhandhaṃ—

ds2.1.2:24.2.pli: Yasmiṃ samaye rūpūpapattiyā maggaṃ bhāveti vivicceva kāmehi …pe… paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati dukkhapaṭipadaṃ dandhābhiññaṃ pathavīkasiṇaṃ, tasmiṃ samaye phasso hoti …pe… avikkhepo hoti …pe…

ds2.1.2:25.2.pli: Yasmiṃ samaye rūpūpapattiyā maggaṃ bhāveti vivicceva kāmehi …pe… paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati dukkhapaṭipadaṃ khippābhiññaṃ pathavīkasiṇaṃ, tasmiṃ samaye phasso hoti …pe… avikkhepo hoti …pe…

ds2.1.2:26.2.pli: Yasmiṃ samaye rūpūpapattiyā maggaṃ bhāveti vivicceva kāmehi …pe… paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati sukhapaṭipadaṃ dandhābhiññaṃ pathavīkasiṇaṃ, tasmiṃ samaye phasso hoti …pe… avikkhepo hoti …pe…

ds2.1.2:27.2.pli: Yasmiṃ samaye rūpūpapattiyā maggaṃ bhāveti vivicceva kāmehi …pe… paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati sukhapaṭipadaṃ khippābhiññaṃ pathavīkasiṇaṃ, tasmiṃ samaye phasso hoti …pe… avikkhepo hoti …pe…

ds2.1.2:28.2.pli: Yasmiṃ samaye rūpūpapattiyā maggaṃ bhāveti vitakkavicārānaṃ vūpasamā …pe… dutiyaṃ jhānaṃ …pe…

ds2.1.2:28.6.pli: pañcamaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati dukkhapaṭipadaṃ dandhābhiññaṃ pathavīkasiṇaṃ …pe…

ds2.1.2:28.10.pli: tasmiṃ samaye phasso hoti …pe… avikkhepo hoti …pe…

ds2.1.2:29.2.pli: Yasmiṃ samaye rūpūpapattiyā maggaṃ bhāveti vivicceva kāmehi …pe… paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati parittaṃ parittārammaṇaṃ pathavīkasiṇaṃ, tasmiṃ samaye phasso hoti …pe… avikkhepo hoti …pe…

ds2.1.2:30.2.pli: Yasmiṃ samaye rūpūpapattiyā maggaṃ bhāveti vivicceva kāmehi …pe… paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati parittaṃ appamāṇārammaṇaṃ pathavīkasiṇaṃ—

ds2.1.2:30.3.pli: tasmiṃ samaye phasso hoti …pe… avikkhepo hoti …pe…

ds2.1.2:31.2.pli: Yasmiṃ samaye rūpūpapattiyā maggaṃ bhāveti vivicceva kāmehi …pe… paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati appamāṇaṃ parittārammaṇaṃ pathavīkasiṇaṃ, tasmiṃ samaye phasso hoti …pe… avikkhepo hoti …pe…

ds2.1.2:32.2.pli: Yasmiṃ samaye rūpūpapattiyā maggaṃ bhāveti vivicceva kāmehi …pe… paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati appamāṇaṃ appamāṇārammaṇaṃ pathavīkasiṇaṃ, tasmiṃ samaye phasso hoti …pe… avikkhepo hoti …pe…

ds2.1.2:33.6.pli: pañcamaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati parittaṃ parittārammaṇaṃ pathavīkasiṇaṃ …pe…

ds2.1.2:33.9.pli: appamāṇaṃ appamāṇārammaṇaṃ pathavīkasiṇaṃ, tasmiṃ samaye phasso hoti …pe… avikkhepo hoti …pe…

ds2.1.2:34.2.pli: Yasmiṃ samaye rūpūpapattiyā maggaṃ bhāveti vivicceva kāmehi …pe… paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati dukkhapaṭipadaṃ dandhābhiññaṃ parittaṃ parittārammaṇaṃ pathavīkasiṇaṃ, tasmiṃ samaye phasso hoti …pe… avikkhepo hoti …pe…

ds2.1.2:38.2.pli: Yasmiṃ samaye rūpūpapattiyā maggaṃ bhāveti vivicceva kāmehi …pe… paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati dukkhapaṭipadaṃ khippābhiññaṃ parittaṃ parittārammaṇaṃ pathavīkasiṇaṃ, tasmiṃ samaye phasso hoti …pe… avikkhepo hoti …pe…

ds2.1.2:39.2.pli: Yasmiṃ samaye rūpūpapattiyā maggaṃ bhāveti vivicceva kāmehi …pe… paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati dukkhapaṭipadaṃ khippābhiññaṃ parittaṃ appamāṇārammaṇaṃ pathavīkasiṇaṃ, tasmiṃ samaye phasso hoti …pe… avikkhepo hoti …pe…

ds2.1.2:87.2.pli: Yasmiṃ samaye rūpūpapattiyā maggaṃ bhāveti ajjhattaṃ arūpasaññī bahiddhā rūpāni passati appamāṇāni, tāni abhibhuyya jānāmi passāmīti vivicceva kāmehi …pe… paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati sukhapaṭipadaṃ dandhābhiññaṃ parittaṃ appamāṇārammaṇaṃ, tasmiṃ samaye phasso hoti …pe… avikkhepo hoti …pe…

ds2.1.2:88.2.pli: Yasmiṃ samaye rūpūpapattiyā maggaṃ bhāveti ajjhattaṃ arūpasaññī bahiddhā rūpāni passati appamāṇāni, tāni abhibhuyya jānāmi passāmīti vivicceva kāmehi …pe… paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati sukhapaṭipadaṃ dandhābhiññaṃ appamāṇaṃ appamāṇārammaṇaṃ, tasmiṃ samaye phasso hoti …pe… avikkhepo hoti …pe…

ds2.1.2:89.2.pli: Yasmiṃ samaye rūpūpapattiyā maggaṃ bhāveti ajjhattaṃ arūpasaññī bahiddhā rūpāni passati appamāṇāni, tāni abhibhuyya jānāmi passāmīti vivicceva kāmehi …pe… paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati sukhapaṭipadaṃ khippābhiññaṃ parittaṃ appamāṇārammaṇaṃ, tasmiṃ samaye phasso hoti …pe… avikkhepo hoti …pe…

ds2.1.2:90.2.pli: Yasmiṃ samaye rūpūpapattiyā maggaṃ bhāveti ajjhattaṃ arūpasaññī bahiddhā rūpāni passati appamāṇāni, tāni abhibhuyya jānāmi passāmīti vivicceva kāmehi …pe… paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati sukhapaṭipadaṃ khippābhiññaṃ appamāṇaṃ appamāṇārammaṇaṃ, tasmiṃ samaye phasso hoti …pe… avikkhepo hoti …pe…

ds2.1.2:91.2.pli: Yasmiṃ samaye rūpūpapattiyā maggaṃ bhāveti ajjhattaṃ arūpasaññī bahiddhā rūpāni passati appamāṇāni, tāni abhibhuyya jānāmi passāmīti vitakkavicārānaṃ vūpasamā …pe… dutiyaṃ jhānaṃ …pe…

ds2.1.2:91.6.pli: pañcamaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati dukkhapaṭipadaṃ dandhābhiññaṃ parittaṃ appamāṇārammaṇaṃ …pe…

ds2.1.2:91.13.pli: sukhapaṭipadaṃ khippābhiññaṃ appamāṇaṃ appamāṇārammaṇaṃ, tasmiṃ samaye phasso hoti …pe… avikkhepo hoti …pe…

ds2.1.2:92.2.pli: Yasmiṃ samaye rūpūpapattiyā maggaṃ bhāveti ajjhattaṃ arūpasaññī bahiddhā rūpāni passati appamāṇāni suvaṇṇadubbaṇṇāni, tāni abhibhuyya jānāmi passāmīti vivicceva kāmehi …pe… paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati, tasmiṃ samaye phasso hoti …pe… avikkhepo hoti …pe…

ds2.1.2:93.2.pli: Yasmiṃ samaye rūpūpapattiyā maggaṃ bhāveti ajjhattaṃ arūpasaññī bahiddhā rūpāni passati appamāṇāni suvaṇṇadubbaṇṇāni, tāni abhibhuyya jānāmi passāmīti vitakkavicārānaṃ vūpasamā …pe… dutiyaṃ jhānaṃ …pe…

ds2.1.2:93.6.pli: pañcamaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati, tasmiṃ samaye phasso hoti …pe… avikkhepo hoti …pe…

ds2.1.2:94.2.pli: Yasmiṃ samaye rūpūpapattiyā maggaṃ bhāveti ajjhattaṃ arūpasaññī bahiddhā rūpāni passati nīlāni nīlavaṇṇāni nīlanidassanāni nīlanibhāsāni, tāni abhibhuyya jānāmi passāmīti vivicceva kāmehi …pe… paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati, tasmiṃ samaye phasso hoti …pe… avikkhepo hoti …pe…

ds2.1.2:95.2.pli: Yasmiṃ samaye rūpūpapattiyā maggaṃ bhāveti ajjhattaṃ arūpasaññī bahiddhā rūpāni passati pītāni pītavaṇṇāni pītanidassanāni pītanibhāsāni …pe…

ds2.1.2:95.4.pli: odātāni odātavaṇṇāni odātanidassanāni odātanibhāsāni, tāni abhibhuyya jānāmi passāmīti vivicceva kāmehi …pe… paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati, tasmiṃ samaye phasso hoti …pe… avikkhepo hoti …pe…

ds2.1.2:96.2.pli: Yasmiṃ samaye rūpūpapattiyā maggaṃ bhāveti rūpī rūpāni passati vivicceva kāmehi …pe… paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati, tasmiṃ samaye phasso hoti …pe… avikkhepo hoti …pe…

ds2.1.2:97.2.pli: Yasmiṃ samaye rūpūpapattiyā maggaṃ bhāveti ajjhattaṃ arūpasaññī bahiddhā rūpāni passati vivicceva kāmehi …pe… paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati, tasmiṃ samaye phasso hoti …pe… avikkhepo hoti …pe…

ds2.1.2:98.2.pli: Yasmiṃ samaye rūpūpapattiyā maggaṃ bhāveti subhanti vivicceva kāmehi …pe… paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati, tasmiṃ samaye phasso hoti …pe… avikkhepo hoti …pe…

ds2.1.2:99.2.pli: Yasmiṃ samaye rūpūpapattiyā maggaṃ bhāveti vivicceva kāmehi …pe… paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati mettāsahagataṃ, tasmiṃ samaye phasso hoti …pe… avikkhepo hoti …pe…

ds2.1.2:100.2.pli: Yasmiṃ samaye rūpūpapattiyā maggaṃ bhāveti vitakkavicārānaṃ vūpasamā …pe… dutiyaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati mettāsahagataṃ, tasmiṃ samaye phasso hoti …pe… avikkhepo hoti …pe…

ds2.1.2:101.2.pli: Yasmiṃ samaye rūpūpapattiyā maggaṃ bhāveti pītiyā ca virāgā …pe…

ds2.1.2:101.3.pli: tatiyaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati mettāsahagataṃ, tasmiṃ samaye phasso hoti …pe… avikkhepo hoti …pe…

ds2.1.2:102.2.pli: Yasmiṃ samaye rūpūpapattiyā maggaṃ bhāveti vivicceva kāmehi …pe… paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati mettāsahagataṃ, tasmiṃ samaye phasso hoti …pe… avikkhepo hoti …pe…

ds2.1.2:103.2.pli: Yasmiṃ samaye rūpūpapattiyā maggaṃ bhāveti avitakkaṃ vicāramattaṃ samādhijaṃ pītisukhaṃ dutiyaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati mettāsahagataṃ, tasmiṃ samaye phasso hoti …pe… avikkhepo hoti …pe…

ds2.1.2:104.2.pli: Yasmiṃ samaye rūpūpapattiyā maggaṃ bhāveti vitakkavicārānaṃ vūpasamā …pe… tatiyaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati mettāsahagataṃ, tasmiṃ samaye phasso hoti …pe… avikkhepo hoti …pe…

ds2.1.2:105.2.pli: Yasmiṃ samaye rūpūpapattiyā maggaṃ bhāveti pītiyā ca virāgā …pe… catutthaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati mettāsahagataṃ, tasmiṃ samaye phasso hoti …pe… avikkhepo hoti …pe…

ds2.1.2:106.2.pli: Yasmiṃ samaye rūpūpapattiyā maggaṃ bhāveti vivicceva kāmehi …pe… paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati karuṇāsahagataṃ, tasmiṃ samaye phasso hoti …pe… avikkhepo hoti …pe…

ds2.1.2:107.2.pli: Yasmiṃ samaye rūpūpapattiyā maggaṃ bhāveti vitakkavicārānaṃ vūpasamā …pe… dutiyaṃ jhānaṃ …pe…

ds2.1.2:107.5.pli: catutthaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati karuṇāsahagataṃ, tasmiṃ samaye phasso hoti …pe… avikkhepo hoti …pe…

ds2.1.2:108.2.pli: Yasmiṃ samaye rūpūpapattiyā maggaṃ bhāveti vivicceva kāmehi …pe… paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati muditāsahagataṃ, tasmiṃ samaye phasso hoti …pe… avikkhepo hoti …pe…

ds2.1.2:109.2.pli: Yasmiṃ samaye rūpūpapattiyā maggaṃ bhāveti vitakkavicārānaṃ vūpasamā …pe… dutiyaṃ jhānaṃ …pe…

ds2.1.2:109.5.pli: catutthaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati muditāsahagataṃ, tasmiṃ samaye phasso hoti …pe… avikkhepo hoti …pe…

ds2.1.2:110.2.pli: Yasmiṃ samaye rūpūpapattiyā maggaṃ bhāveti sukhassa ca pahānā …pe… catutthaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati upekkhāsahagataṃ, tasmiṃ samaye phasso hoti …pe… avikkhepo hoti …pe…

ds2.1.2:111.2.pli: Yasmiṃ samaye rūpūpapattiyā maggaṃ bhāveti vivicceva kāmehi …pe… paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati uddhumātakasaññāsahagataṃ, tasmiṃ samaye phasso hoti …pe… avikkhepo hoti …pe…

ds2.1.2:112.2.pli: Yasmiṃ samaye rūpūpapattiyā maggaṃ bhāveti vivicceva kāmehi …pe… paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati vinīlakasaññāsahagataṃ …pe…

ds2.1.2:112.10.pli: aṭṭhikasaññāsahagataṃ, tasmiṃ samaye phasso hoti …pe… avikkhepo hoti …pe…
